src:
Bangunan SD Roboh Lagi, Pakar Pendidikan Duga ada Dosa Korupsi
05 Nov 2019, 16:45 by Bunaiya Fauzi Arubone


Bangunan SD Roboh Lagi, Pakar Pendidikan Duga ada Dosa Korupsi

KBRN, Jakarta : Robohnya atap bangunan beberapa kelas di SDN Gentong, Kecamatan Gadingrejo, Kota Pasuruan, Selasa (5/11/2019) pagi tadi dinilai karena dosa alias dugaan kasus korupsi dari birokrasi pendidikan di negeri ini.Pakar Pendidikan, Asep Sapa'at mengatakan, mestinya, bangunan sekolah sangat aman bagi para penghuninya. Baik itu siswa maupun guru dan petugas sekolah lainnya."Nah, dengan adanya korban meninggal karena ambruk itu, tentu menjadi suatu peringatan yang sangat keras bahwa dunia pendidikan adalah tempat yang ternyata juga tempat yang paling tidak aman. Inikan faktanya jelas satu siswa meninggal (dan satu guru) karena robohnya gedung SD," katanya saat berbincang dengan Radio Republik Indonesia, Selasa (5/11/2019).Robohnya sekolah kata dia bukan hanya terjadi sekali atau dua kali, korbannya pun di daerah lain bahkan pernah mencapai satu kelas banyaknya. Hal ini terjadi menurut dia karena adanya dugaan kasus korupsi di dunia pendidikan di negeri ini.Dimana diduganya ada orang-orang di birokrasi pendidikan yang tidak bertanggung jawab yang sengaja menurunkan kualitas bangunan sekolah agar dananya bisa dikorupsi."Kalau kita bangunan sekolah kan standar harus bagus sekali. Kriteria bagus aman, nyaman dan membuat anak-anak belajar dengan baik. Hari ini faktor keamanan jelas tidak terjadi. Ini lagi-lagi saya pikir ini adalah dosa birokrasi pendidikan," sesalnya.Untuk itu menurut dia, pihak-pihak terkait yang bertanggung jawab haruslah segera meminta maaf. Paling tidak kepada para keluarga korban terdampak."Saya pikir kita harus minta maaf kepada keluarga korban yang ditinggalkan. Ini tentu menyedihkan," pungkasnya.Perlu diketahui, pagi tadi, bangunan SDB Gentong roboh. Satu siswa dan seorang guru pun dilaporkan meninggal dunia.Berdasarkan laporan dari reporter RRI di lokasi, atap bangunan kelas 2A, 2B, 5A dan 5B di sekolah itu  tiba-tiba roboh pada saat proses belajar mengajar. Reruntuhan bangunan pun menimpa mereka. Alhasil, salah seorang guru, atas nama Vina Fairina (20, warga RT 09, RW 08, Kelurahan Mandaranrejo, Kecamatan Bangun Rejo, Pasuruan pun meninggal dunia.Tidak hanya Sang Guru, ada juga satu orang siswi kelas 2, atas nama Irza Almira (8), warga RT, 01, RW 06 Kelurahan Gentong, Kecamatan Gading Rejo, Kota Pasuruan pun ikut meninggal dunia. (Foto: Tangkap Layar/TV One)
text:
Elementary School Collapses Again, Education Specialist Suspected of Corruption Sin
05 Nov 2019, 16:45 by Bunaiya Fauzi Arubone


Elementary School Collapses Again, Education Specialist Suspected of Corruption Sin

KBRN, Jakarta: The collapse of the roof of several class buildings in Gentong Elementary School, Gadingrejo District, Pasuruan City, Tuesday (11/5/2019) this morning was judged to be a sin aka alleged corruption cases from the education bureaucracy in this country. Education Powers, Asep Sapa'at say, they should, the school building is very safe for the residents. Both students and teachers and other school officials. "Now, with the victims dying from the collapse, it would be a very strong warning that the world of education is also the most insecure place. This is clearly the fact that one student died (and one teacher) because of the collapse of the elementary school building, "he said when speaking with Radio Republik Indonesia, Tuesday (11/05/2019). The collapse of the school said he did not only happen once or twice, his victims in other regions had even reached one class. This happened according to him because of the alleged corruption cases in the world of education in this country. Where it was assumed there were people in the irresponsible education bureaucracy who deliberately lowered the quality of school buildings so that funds could be corrupted. "If we build school buildings, standards must be good very good criteria are safe, comfortable and make children learn well. Today the safety factor is clearly not happening. This is again I think this is a sin of educational bureaucracy, "he regretted. For that according to him, the relevant parties responsible answer should apologize immediately. At least to the families of the affected victims. "I think we should apologize to the families of the survivors. This is certainly sad," he concluded. It should be known, this morning, the Gentong SDB building collapsed. One student and a teacher were reported to have died. Based on reports from RRI reporters on the location, the roofs of class 2A, 2B, 5A and 5B in the school suddenly collapsed during the teaching and learning process. The ruins of buildings fell on them. As a result, one of the teachers, on behalf of Vina Fairina (20, a resident of RT 09, RW 08, Mandaranrejo Village, Bangun Rejo District, Pasuruan also died. Not only the teacher, there was also a class 2 student, in the name of Irza Almira ( 8), a resident of RT, 01, RW 06 Gentong Village, Gading Rejo District, Pasuruan City, also died. (Photo: Capture Screen / TV One)
